text:
Location: New York, NY

ExpandTheRoom, a boutique creative agency, is looking for full-time Mobile Developers (Windows Phone 7, iOS, Android) as well as PHP Developers and UX Designers. We have a truly excellent team of developers and designers, and a fun work environment and culture. We'd also consider internships.

You can email us at iwannawork@expandtheroom.com, or check the site: http://www.expandtheroom.com/jobs
